name: Doge Blue
description: What is the project about? Doge Blue is the first project to propose the best logo for Twitter. Doge Blue is building a decentralized community of designers that are rewarded for their creativity. We believe in the potential of all designers and want to encourage them to show their best work through our contests. What makes your project unique? Burn Mechanism is an important feature. The contract is well-designed for auto buyback and burns DOGEBLUE tokens for each transaction automatically. This promises a steady increase in the token price in long run. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Stage 1: Team Formation, project idea brainstorming. Stage 2: Website, Brand design, Social Media creation, Community formation. Stage 3: Contract deployment, Airdrop, Audit, KYC, Pinksale presale, Presale marketing. Stage 4: Launch, Prelaunch marketing, CMC and CG Listing. CEX Listing. Stage 5: Utility deployment: Design-to-earn, Vote-to-earn, DAO dApp, Mining dApp Stage 6: Limited 10k NFTs launch in Opensea, NFT marketing promotion Stage 7: Ecosystem built, Top tier CEX Listing. What can your token be used for? Doge Blue is creating a new way of investing and getting passive income. The contract is well-designed for generating passive income by auto-reflection for each buy/sell transaction in real time. We will also launch mining dApp to reward our loyal diamond hands
